attributes.action: make Fred Goodwin, the former boss of RBS, return his pension back to the taxpayers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A job well done is a job rewarded. When all around people are losing their employment, their homes and the economy is in freefall. Why is the former boss of a company that has just reported 24.1 billion in losses receiving a LIFETIME pension of 650,000 pounds? 
As this institution is now partially nationalised ..it is the hardworking, taxpaying millions that will be paying for this FATCAT to reap our rewards. Many people are being rewarded with unemployment for a job well done.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
